benefits.description: 8 complimentary domestic airport lounge visits per year (2 per calendar quarter)
4 complimentary international airport lounge visits per year (1 per calendar quarter) via Priority Pass
10% back as NeuCoins on Tata Neu App spends (5% card reward + 5% NeuPass benefit)
1.5% back as NeuCoins on other eligible non-EMI spends and UPI transactions (RuPay variant)
1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions between ₹400 and ₹5,000 (max ₹500 per statement cycle)
